function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for comfortable and high-quality housing due to the COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Shortage of suitable housing leading to housing insecurity and overcrowding","Mitigation":"Investing in the development of new high-quality housing and recovery of existing properties","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, sustainable construction materials, and air purification systems","People":"Households and tenants","Owner":"Real estate developers and housing providers"},{"Description":"Overlap of residential and office real estate sectors","Impact":"Confusion in zoning and infrastructure planning, potential spread of contagious diseases in mixed-use spaces","Mitigation":"Clear zoning regulations, building design for infection control, and separate ventilation systems","Technologies":"Smart zoning software, air filtration systems, and building management systems","People":"Real estate and property owners, urban planners","Owner":"Government authorities, city planning departments"},{"Description":"Changes in sustainability requirements for residential buildings","Impact":"Environmental and health risks from insufficient sustainability measures","Mitigation":"Evaluation and improvement of sustainability standards, investment in green building technologies","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy-efficient appliances, and sustainable building materials","People":"Residential building owners and developers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, building certification organizations"}]}
